description:
Overview

ISACA is a professional association and learning organization powered by a passionate community of more than 165,000 members and technology professionals around the world, who work in digital trust fields such as information security, governance, assurance, risk, privacy, and quality. For more than 50 years, ISACA has equipped these individuals and enterprises with the knowledge, credentials, education, training, and community to progress their careers, transform their organizations, and build a more trusted and ethical digital world. Come join an organization with an inspiring mission, a pay for performance culture, and top-shelf benefits plans.

Responsibilities

· Generate sales into sponsorship accounts and prospects new business· Partner and maintain long term relationships with strategic sponsorship clients to ensure year over year growth with increased revenue spend and cross-sales of opportunities· Consistently maintain data in the Customer Relationship Management (CRM) system. Forecast accurately, build a pipeline and progress opportunities in a timely manner.· Develop and customize client presentations and proposals· Coordinate and engage with sponsorship fulfillment team to meet sales objectives and ensure the best possible client experience

Qualifications
• Account experience delivering new business programs and growing existing relationships
• Ability to work a flexible schedule to ensure ample service levels for clients in multiple time zones
• Diligent work ethic and insatiable desire to learn and develop skills
• Self-starter, highly motivated and ability to work independently
• Excellent oral and written communication skills
• Proven experience with multimedia
• Ability to present new ideas, approaches, and information clearly and solicit influence
• Elite time management skills and ability to manage multiple projects effectively to meet deadlines
• Cultural sensitivity/awareness
• Collaborative team player, ability to build strong relationships internally, across functional areas, organizations (ISACA Enterprise) externally with members, constituents, and volunteers
• Commitment to organization purpose and values
• Proficiency in Microsoft Office products (Outlook, Word, PowerPoint, and Excel)
• Collaborative and supportive of team environment
• Strong business acumen
• Creativity and entrepreneurial spirit
• Must be able to travel up to 15%
• Must have valid passport
